official-title.#text:
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3393) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to
			 consolidate certain tax benefits for educational expenses, and for other
			 purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4935) to amend
			 the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make improvements to the child tax
			 credit.

committee-name.#tail:
, reported the following resolution; which was referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be
			 printed

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to consolidate certain
			 tax benefits for educational expenses, and for other purposes. All points
			 of order against consideration of the bill are waived. The amendment in
			 the nature of a substitute recommended by the

now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in the report
			 of the

accompanying this resolution, shall be
			 considered as adopted. The bill, as amended, shall be considered as read.
			 All points of order against provisions in the bill, as amended, are
			 waived. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the bill,
			 as amended, and on any further amendment thereto to final passage without
			 intervening motion except: (1) one hour of debate equally divided and
			 controlled by the chair and ranking minority member of the

; and (2) one motion to recommit with or without
			 instructions.

text.#text: That upon adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to consider in the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
to make improvements to the
			 child tax credit. All points of order against consideration of the bill
			 are waived. In lieu of the amendment in the nature of a substitute
			 recommended by the

now printed in the bill, an
			 amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules
			 Committee Print 113-54 shall be considered as adopted. The bill, as
			 amended, shall be considered as read. All points of order against
			 provisions in the bill, as amended, are waived. The previous question
			 shall be considered as ordered on the bill, as amended, and on any further
			 amendment thereto to final passage without intervening motion except: (1)
			 one hour of debate equally divided and controlled by the chair and ranking
			 minority member of the

; and (2) one motion to
			 recommit with or without instructions.

text.#text: Upon adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to consider in the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Clerk of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , as new matter at the end of

text.#text: assign appropriate designations to provisions within the engrossment; and
conform provisions for short titles within the engrossment.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be laid on the table.
